data.message: September 2017 Coca Cola Christmas Truck stop in Nuneaton for one day and it was in Coventry Telegraph newspaper for Coventry and Warwickshire Area also in Nottingham Post newspaper and I saw that on they Facebook also on they website. Please could you arrange something for family who got children, teenagers, old people, school children also disabled people who really like to see Coca Cola Christmas Truck in Nuneaton as it never came to Nuneaton before.
